name: Record a vaccine with nhs number [1-9450141444-ALBERT HOUSE-Care Home-yes-today-4-yes-yes-today-2-BRANDIE DYBLE-25/8/1992-49 BLACKPOOL ROAD NORTH, LYTHAM ST. ANNES, LANCS, FY8 3DF-Flu-Fluenz LAIV \u2013 Astra Zeneca-SDYY2-21A-19/10/2026]

steps.name: Given I login to RAVS and set vaccinator details with ALBERT HOUSE and Care Home and get patient details for 9450141444 with option 1 and choose to vaccinate with vaccine details as Flu, Fluenz LAIV – Astra Zeneca, SDYY2-21A with 19/10/2026
And I search for a patient with the NHS number in the find a patient screen
And I open the patient record by clicking on patient BRANDIE DYBLE
When I click choose vaccine button and choose the Flu, Fluenz LAIV – Astra Zeneca, SDYY2-21A with 19/10/2026 and click continue
And I assess the patient's yes with the details and date as today-4 and click continue to record consent screen button
And I record yes with the details and click continue to vaccinate button
And I record yes details and date as today-2 and click Continue to Check and confirm screen
Then I need to be able to see the patient BRANDIE DYBLE, 25/8/1992, 49 BLACKPOOL ROAD NORTH, LYTHAM ST. ANNES, LANCS, FY8 3DF and vaccination details on the check and confirm screen
